name: Simple Wii Series Vol. 4: The Shooting Action
overview: Simple Wii Series Vol. 4: The DokoDemo Asoberu - The Shooting Action (SIMPLE WiiシリーズVol.4 THEシューティング･アクション) is a shoot'um up game. The player uses the left joystick to control the character movement in the game, and the right joystick controls the aiming. And shooting direction. Although the gameplay is somewhat similar to Geometry Warfare, this game adds a "power boosting system" and a "special attack" that consumes energy, which makes the game fun. The game's mode is also rich, players can play one-on-one "single-hand mode" with the computer or "match mode" between friends and up to four people. In addition, you can use Wi-Fi Connection to conduct online battles around the world.
